description: In this course, we explore some more advanced features of PowerPoint 2016. We start with digging deeper into PowerPoint preferences, customizing the interface, and exploring advanced file properties including accessibility and security. Other topics include modifying the all-important slide master, inserting audio and video, and collaborating with others. We finish up the series with customizing the delivery of presentations with custom shows and hyperlinks.
descriptionMD: In this course, we explore some more advanced features of PowerPoint 2016. We start with digging deeper into PowerPoint preferences, customizing the interface, and exploring advanced file properties including accessibility and security. Other topics include modifying the all-important slide master, inserting audio and video, and collaborating with others. We finish up the series with customizing the delivery of presentations with custom shows and hyperlinks.
name: Advanced PowerPoint 2016 for Mac
subtitle: Presentation application to create slide shows

episodes.description: In this course, we explore some more advanced features of PowerPoint 2016. We start with digging deeper into PowerPoint preferences, customizing the interface, and exploring advanced file properties including accessibility and security. Other topics include modifying the all-important slide master, inserting audio and video, and collaborating with others. We finish up the series with customizing the delivery of presentations with custom shows and hyperlinks.
episodes.title: Overview

episodes.description: In this episode, Vonne and Zac take a closer look at the preferences in PowerPoint for Mac.  Vonne shows how users can customize the user interface by creating custom tabs on the ribbon and adding commands to the Quick Access Toolbar.
episodes.title: Customize PowerPoint Interface

episodes.description: In this episode, Vonne and Zac work with the Slide Master in PowerPoint. They demonstrate working with the Slide Master to customize design themes and overall presentations. They also talk about the use of PowerPoint templates and how to create them.
episodes.title: Slide Masters

episodes.description: In this episode, Vonne and Mike look at how to insert audio and video into a PowerPoint presentation and playback options. They also show how you can record your own audio directly into a slide as well has how to record narration for an entire presentation. Vonne also shows how you can add music to play in the background across a picture slideshow.
episodes.title: Audio and Video

episodes.description: In this episode, Vonne and Mike look at adding and managing comments in PowerPoint presentation. Vonne shows how to collaborate by uploading a presentation to OneDrive, giving access to others, and chat in real time using PowerPoint Online.
episodes.title: Comment and Collaborate

episodes.description: In this episode, Vonne and Mike discuss creating custom shows in PowerPoint. They demonstrate how to rehearse timings as well as adding hyperlinks and action buttons. They also show how to use one presentation for multiple groups by creating custom or 'sub' shows within a presentation.
episodes.title: Custom Shows

episodes.description: In this episode, Vonne and Mike look at file metadata and other advanced file properties. They discuss adding tags and categories to help find a file. They also look at accessibility options, compatibility options, and how to protect a presentation with passwords to open and/or modify a file.
episodes.title: Advanced File Properties
